subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{l|mul|[[𦦙]]}} (U+26999) - The bottom component is written {{l|mul|丰}} instead of {{l|mul|手}}. * {{l|mul|[[舉]]}} (U+8209) - The bottom component is written as ⿻一十.

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character is used in Korean {{w|hanja}} and Japanese {{w|kyūjitai}}.

subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[㩮]], [[欅]], [[𪼰]], [[𮂥]], [[𮒾]], [[㐦]]}}
* {{l|mul|[[襷]]}} ''(Exception: Only for mainland China and Japanese character form. Taiwan character contains {{l|mul|舉}} while Hong Kong character contains {{l|mul|𦦙}})''

subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[𭢅]]}} ''(Calligraphic {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant}} of ''<big>擧</big>)
* {{l|mul|[[𦦙]]}} ''(Historical {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant}} of ''<big>擧</big>)
* {{l|mul|[[舉]]}} ''(Preferred form used for {{w|Traditional Chinese|traditional Chinese}} in modern Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau)''
* {{l|mul|[[挙]]}} ''(Japanese {{w|shinjitai}} form of ''<big>擧</big>)
* {{l|mul|[[举]]}} ''({{w|Simplified Chinese|Simplified}} form of {{l|mul|舉}} in mainland China)''
